name: Prydween Quest
description:
Help luna DECUT to pass trhough 39 levels full of funny creatures and enigmatic levels more complex step by step.

Use your mind to achieve conquests and have to fight against horrible and evilness monsters.

Can you find it ?.....

NOTE : I programmed this game roughly on 2010-2011. The animation of Luna is not present, and music is not very good. But all game is nice !

Enjoy ! VIPES.
